titleStmt.title: A new marriage, between Mr. King, and Mrs. Parliament. The banes forbidden by Captaine Army, with the grounds and reasons he gives for the same. Come, come away unto this happy wedding, ... and through all nations shall your honor ring.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare M Dc xLviii. [1648]

notesStmt.note: The roman numeral date in the imprint is made with turned C's.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
